name: CTCellularPlanProvisioningRequest
desc: A request specifying an eSIM to download and install.

items.name: var address: String
items.desc: The address of the carrier network’s eSIM server.

items.name: var confirmationCode: String?
items.desc: The provisioning request’s confirmation code, provided by the network operator when initiating an eSIM download.

items.name: var iccid: String?
items.desc: The provisioning request’s Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (ICCID).
